com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase
Class HBaseClientProxy

java.lang.Object
  com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.HBaseClientProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
HBaseClient
public class HBaseClientProxy
extends Object
implements HBaseClient

Proxies the HBaseClient API to an HBaseClient.
